definition: to withdraw/to pull back/to contract/to shrink/to reduce/abbreviation/also pr. [su4]

sentences.english: So we're confident that the North Koreans do, in fact, have a program to enrich uranium to produce nuclear weapons.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我們確知北韓有製造核武器的濃縮鈾項目。

sentences.english: The plant did not process weapon-grade uranium till 1987.
sentences.chinese: 到1987年，該廠就不再生產軍用濃縮鈾了。

sentences.english: Like enriched uranium, hypocrisy can be costlier than it seems.
sentences.chinese: 就如濃縮鈾，僞善的代價比看起來的更高。

sentences.english: Plutonium and highly enriched uranium can be used to build nuclear weapons.
sentences.chinese: 鈽元素以及高度濃縮鈾可以用來製造核武器。

sentences.english: Iran's Foreign Minister Manouchehr Mottaki says his country has no reason to suspend its nuclear activities.
sentences.chinese: 伊朗外長穆塔基說，伊朗沒有理由中止濃縮鈾活動。

sentences.english: A visit to the uranium enrichment facility in Natanz is also on the agenda.
sentences.chinese: 訪問日程還包括訪問納坦茲的濃縮鈾設施。

sentences.english: If you keep a Betta in a bowl, make sure you give it plenty of enrichment.
sentences.chinese: 如果您保持鬥魚在一碗，一定要給予足夠的濃縮鈾。

sentences.english: Enriching raw uranium is more expensive than converting highly enriched uranium to fuel grade.
sentences.chinese: 濃縮原鈾比將高濃縮鈾轉化至燃料品級更昂貴。

sentences.english: Fissile materials used in nuclear bomb production include highly enriched uranium and plutonium.
sentences.chinese: 用於製造核彈的裂變材料包括高濃縮鈾和鈈。

sentences.english: Iran has said it was seeking enriched uranium for a civilian nuclear-powered electricity program.
sentences.chinese: 伊朗表示尋求濃縮鈾是爲了一個民用核電項目。

sentences.english: What I can verify is that the issue of enriched uranium has been touched upon.
sentences.chinese: 我可以證實的是，濃縮鈾的問題在會上有所提及。

sentences.english: Canada agreed to give up a significant quantity of highly enriched uranium.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大同意放棄相當數量的高純度濃縮鈾。
